topics.title: Causative: Have / Get something done
topics.description: Learn how to describe actions done for you by someone else.

topics.title: Reported Orders and Requests
topics.description: Practice reporting commands and polite requests.

topics.title: Participle Clauses
topics.description: Use participles to make your writing more concise.

topics.title: Modals: Should have, Might have, Could have
topics.description: Talk about past possibilities and regrets.

topics.title: Contrast: Although / In spite of / However
Emphasis: What / It is / Inversion
topics.description: Highlight information in a sentence for emphasis.

topics.title: Conditionals Review
topics.description: Revise all types of conditionals including mixed.

topics.title: Future in the Past
topics.description: Understand ‘was going to’, ‘would’, and other forms.

topics.title: Relative Clauses with Prepositions
topics.description: Use ‘to which’, ‘for whom’ and similar forms.
